scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Rob Baker
scrape.text: I read this in one day that included a four-hour flight. It kept me me wondering what was going to happen...and at times was darkly funny, especially in its send-up of trendy restaurants. However, there are no likable main characters in the book - everyone is base and mocked or mocking— so in the end, I didn’t find it very worthwhile as a whole.
